full_text:
Mcvay and Shanahan are both known for their offensive playcalling. Both also use a play-script in the beginning of the game to assist their playcalling. 

Do these offenses play differently when these scripts are used? I used @nflfastR to explore this. 

#nflverse #SFvsLAR (1/2) https://t.co/0BnvMghfSH

My X-Factor for the AFCCG? Tee Higgins.

Ja'Marr Chase torched the Chiefs in Week 17 (11/266/3!), so I think KC tries to "Belichick" him and focuses on shutting him out.

If this happens, I think Higgins, who excelled when Chase struggled, becomes the go-to for Cincy.

#nflverse https://t.co/aPQlTKi8hH
